description: Describes the refresh properties of a dataset.

parameters.name: AwsAccountId
parameters.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID.

nested_items.name: RequestId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services request ID for this operation.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The HTTP status of the request.

nested_items.name: RefreshConfiguration
nested_items.description: The refresh configuration for a dataset.

nested_items.name: IncrementalRefresh
nested_items.description: The incremental refresh for the dataset.

nested_items.name: LookbackWindow
nested_items.description: The lookback window setup for an incremental refresh configuration.

nested_items.name: ColumnName
nested_items.description: The name of the lookback window column.

nested_items.name: SizeUnit
nested_items.description: The size unit that is used for the lookback window column. Valid values for this structure are HOUR, DAY, and WEEK.

nested_items.name: FailureConfiguration
nested_items.description: The failure configuration for a dataset.

nested_items.name: EmailAlert
nested_items.description: The email alert configuration for a dataset refresh failure.

nested_items.name: AlertStatus
nested_items.description: The status value that determines if email alerts are sent.
